Allergic or hypersensitivity to chicken, eggs

div.h5: Possible mild side effects include: These reactions usually disappear 1 - 2 days without treatment

field.string: Soreness, redness, and swelling at the injection site

div.h5: Severe allergic reaction, you need to bring the patient to a nearest hospital emergency department immediately
